name: SPSS Analysis Plan File
summary: Learn about .CSAPLAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In order to run an analysis plan, you need to copy the syntax generated from a CSAPLAN file, paste it into an SPSS syntax file (.SPS file), and then run in SPSS. The Analysis Preparation Wizard has an option that does this automatically. The option is labeled, "Paste the syntax generated by the Wizard into a syntax window."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
